website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for anyone looking for a basic propane grill, but patience is required to put it together.
pros: An affordable model with handy features, such as the swing-away warming rack and handy side burner
Provides decent cook space for the price
cons: Assembly is challenging, and the instructions could be better
The flame occasionally goes out without warning

customer_reviews.title: This should be free
customer_reviews.text: This thing ships as millions of parts. There must be 200 screws... Everything has to be assembled. It’s easily 3 hours of your life if your wife and kids leave you alone and you are in peak physical and mental form. Do not buy this unless you have nothing to do for a whole day and IKEA furniture assembly is your hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: The Ignitor doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought and noticed a lot of people complained that the ignitor for the main burner didn't work. However, there were so many good reviews about what a great grill it is. So I bought. There is no spark on ours. The one for the side burner works fine. Already assembled so will try part from old grill. My husband is a mechanical genius so he will figure something out. One or more of the reviews also said no part available. Will use a long lighter if needed. Good grill for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Our Needs
customer_reviews.text: I wish there would be a temperature gauge in it but that isn't a big deal. I had read reviews that said it was very difficult to put together and that concerned me. However, it wasn't that hard as long as I followed directions. One thing I did was lay out all of the parts which helped. It heats up well, has plenty of space and worked fine for our first cook out with it. I'm very pleased with it and will do great for us sitting out on our pool patio.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shetterly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a two person assembly. The fasteners are well labeled but the components are generally unmarked. Follow the instructions and go slow. It took my wife and I about two hours to complete. Helpful notes: the black trapezoid shield is the "front" of the grill not the back. Thus, put the knob side of the firebox facing or on the same side as the black shield. Have needle nose pliers for sliding the igniter wires on to the igniter push button. If you get a side burner, that ignition wire goes onto the side slide of the igniter housing while the main igniter goes directly into the back or center of the igniter housing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oldham

customer_reviews.title: it has good even heat
customer_reviews.text: Ya know... at just over a $100, I don't know how long it will last but I'd rather replace it 2-3 times for the cost of one other grill after it gets weather warn then purchase an expensive one. On another note, it has good even heat, The ignitor works well. The valve on the side burner didn't work. I had to bypass it to just use the grill. No biggy, I wouldn't have purchased the side burner model anyway but it was on sale cheaper than the one without the burner.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Gagner

customer_reviews.title: It's everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I thought it was going to be a nightmare to assemble, but the instructions are clear and detailed, yet simple enough to follow easily. Took about 90 mins to put together and everything works great. It even arrived early. It will be used often.
customer_reviews.author: Dcoe1957

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Our old grill was starting to give out. I read the reviews about the difficulties others were having putting the grill together. My honey got it together pretty quickly. As the other reviews stated, it did take a couple of beers. LOL We have already used it several times and it is working great! Also, the price can't be beat. I researched grills at local stores and they were all much higher in price. Great Deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: debbiekscearce

customer_reviews.title: Assembly takes time, but it's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was reading a lot of the reviews on this BBQ before I ended up purchasing it as a father's day gift. Most of the reviews complained about the assembly being a nightmare or that parts are delivered damaged. I fortunately enough didn't encounter either of these issues. All the parts came in brand new condition and I was able to assemble the grill in little over an hour and a half! I've used about 5 times already and everything works exactly as advertised! I don't know that this grill will look like 6 months done the line but I feel that as long as I take good care of it, it's gonna last!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Paz

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good little grill for a small family. a lot of reviews say it is a pain to put together. it took my husband 2 hours while he was also working to get together, which is about average for a grill. its not that many pieces. works great once together.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I used ONCE about 2 months ago and stored it inside. Even bought a waterproof cover for it. The gas valve broke after one use and when the gas is turned on, it leaks out through the valve. Spent $160 on it, plus the cover, and now I have to buy the hose with the valve for it. Great second time using.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Grill - Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Our Big Box arrived and we knew that we were in for a 2-day venture in putting this baby together, BUT, honestly, it took us 3 hours, a little focus, some laughs, and a few glasses of red wine (me with the wine), then....VOILA!!! My husband had a beautiful grill!!! We followed the directions and some advise that other customer reviews and took care of business. My husband LOVES his grill!!!!! He's used it several times already, and totally Loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanceana Reynard

customer_reviews.title: works good, only issue I have is the side burner ...
customer_reviews.text: works good, only issue I have is the side burner under is pretty far down from where the pan/pot sits. It needs to be a bit closer to the bottom of the pan so there is less loss of heat. Otherwise it works well
customer_reviews.author: A Carr

customer_reviews.title: It just doesn't get hot enough, no matter how long you wait. Lifespan about 2-3 years :/
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review after using this BBQ for 2 years. I've always complained that it never got hot enough - you're basically slow-cooking everything you put on it. Char? Nope. Importantly, after 2 years the entire inside is basically rusted out - all the areas that touch the flame are rusted and falling apart, including the grill part. This wasn't expensive, but I was expecting more and am really quite disappointed. I wouldn't recommend this grill to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: heathbc888

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, great price
customer_reviews.text: We needed a good basic grill and we got this one for ~$113 with 3 burners and a side cooking one. We've grilled with it for say, 5 times already and it's been working as expected. We've seen a lot of bad reviews related to the installation but we have had zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Katy B

customer_reviews.title: Piezoelectric igniters do not work, replacements not available
customer_reviews.text: Piezoelectric igniters: button is missing the pin in the center for the main burner so that one can't work. Turns out the main burner igniter wire is broken anyway. Because the button is faulty, the side burner won't light automatically either. Tried to order new parts from Char-Broil, and the igniter is not available. I would have packed everything up & returned it, but by the time to attach & test the igniters, the grill's pretty much built, and I had a couple of hours invested. I'll go Lowe's or somewhere and buy generic parts and make them work. I hope it cooks great...
customer_reviews.author: Jon Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Basic no frills grill
customer_reviews.text: I just put this together and fired it up. Fairly easy assembly. The instructions were pretty idiot proof but you need to follow them. Seems solid for the price. Much better than the no name grill we got from Walmart 2 years ago and the bottom rusted through. It's just an inexpensive basic grill and that's what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: besinger

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the reviews about it having "500 plus pieces"
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this grill. I thought for the money I would be getting something flimsier and small, but it's perfect. I spent about an hour putting it together while catching up on some TV so if you're not distracted by a murder mystery show, it probably takes less time. I am HORRIBLE with directions, but this was fairly easy to put together. I will say this. Connect the ignitor wire from the side burner to the ignitor BEFORE you put on the protective silver plate. It was a PAIN to attach after the fact, and to be honest got lucky there. I made burgers last night, and clean up was simple. I love this grill!
customer_reviews.author: John Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Great cook.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Char-Broil grill to replace my old Char-Broil grill. The Char- Broil brand has always been reliable and sturdy brand. I had my old one for over 8 years. That's being left outside all year. I like the side burner and warming rack this model provided. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Havey

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: The grills works well but we have to make some modifications and learn how to work with some of its design features. For example, the rack above the side burner is too high and the food cooks very slowly. Also, the middle part of the grill is quite hotter than its sides.
customer_reviews.author: Playwright

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: We have only used 2 times but are in love with it. Its the perfect size for a slab of ribs on top rack and steaks, burgers, chicken, or brats on bottom rack! Perfect size to throw into back of truck when we go camping too!
customer_reviews.author: wendy lovin-horne

customer_reviews.title: cant review
customer_reviews.text: grill was delievered without manual, assembly instructions, and hardware parts . had to return, ups picked up no problem on return, ended up getting a char broil at lowes assembeled and better model for $8.00 more.
customer_reviews.author: timothy foster

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for a lower priced Grill!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this, although it takes sometime to put together, definitely worth it! Starts easily! Lots of Space. No need to turn on 3rd burner off doing a smaller Portion. Also do Kabobs and they were perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Problems with lighting
customer_reviews.text: We bought and everything was great putting it together.But it would not start with the button.We started it with a match.Called them and they sent a new part,still not lighting with the button.Other than that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill
customer_reviews.text: Grill works great, cooks well, holds temp very good. Was a big harder to put together then i expected. the instructions are not in the best order to get it done. but got it finally
customer_reviews.author: Donald Eugene Leas

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good on this little baby. I needed a grill FAST for the 4th of July and I didn't want to spend a lot. I ordered it when I was in Japan and it arrived the day after I returned. Perfect! Had a big bbq and lots of fun. No issues!
customer_reviews.author: MDM

customer_reviews.title: MIssing parts!
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble and the picture instructions were clear enough (only had one part that was somewhat unclear, until I realized it was the underside being pictured). However, mine did not come with wheels! I searched through all the cardboard, boxes and all packaging material to see if they have been stuffed inside of something else. However, it looks like they just forgot to put them in! :(
customer_reviews.author: Anakha

customer_reviews.title: He's Happy/ I'm Happier
customer_reviews.text: My husband looks for reasons to grill anything now... He's grilling 5 out of 7 days... Less frying foods... And less cooking overall for me... He really likes our new grill. #WinWin
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: This is a good grill friend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill for a friend with four teenage boys, based on good reviews, and the name brand. Her grill caught on fire, and I didn’t want her to miss out on the joys of grilling
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Carmello

customer_reviews.title: Was left with at least 100 extra screws washers and other pieces to the Grille
customer_reviews.text: The top rack doesn’t stay on When I go to clean The grill racks itself they come off they don’t fit correctly on the grill the grill definitely wasn’t worth the money I spent on it I wouldn’t buy it again and the assembly to put the grill together was a pain in the butt and I was left with a lot of nuts bolts and screws I don’t understand why I was left with so many extras
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required but fairly easy
customer_reviews.text: It had a lot of parts.. I took it out of the box and my husband said he’s not putting it together because he would get frustrated and mad so it took about an hour to put it together.. instructions are in picture form so I just matched it up and it came together pretty easy.. I have used the grill a few times and works well..
customer_reviews.author: ksenia

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. It dies the job and won’t rus out like Weber’s do
customer_reviews.text: The burner covers are not well fitting and fall off at the most inconvenient time. You get what you pay for. The bowl base gets greasy and would not be fun to clean,
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly2

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The directions was a bit confusing the screw an such are not labeled to good but I managed to figure it out. Over I am very pleased with this purchase. The shipping was in a timely manner quality of the product is better than expected
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: put together on Sunday if you follow the instructioon manuel it goes together pretty good. It did take 2 1/2 -3 Hrs
customer_reviews.text: just recived today, 5/20. put together on Sunday if you follow the instructioon manuel it goes together pretty good. It did take 2 1/2 -3 Hrs. with both of us but I wouldn't say it was hard. Just follow the directions on each page and it goes together pretty good ,.After assembling the grill, I tried to light it per instructions and everything went well. Can't wait to cook something on it for Memorial Day, For the price I think it is a very good grill. I didn't need a big 7 burner grill so this grill was perfect for my needs and the price was right. I would recommend this grill to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Baer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly and starter issues but good otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to assemble..starter is garbage ant safe..It starts after multiple trials and in the meantime the gas is running...very dangerous. Best bet is to use a lighter for safety. After going through the assembly and starter hurdles you can then start enjoying your grill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful BBQ
customer_reviews.text: This grill is excellent. It was easy to assemble, and that's saying something since I am useless around the home fixing, repairing and assembling things. However, the directions were excellent so assembling it was rather easy. I recommend the grill. David L.
customer_reviews.author: David Lally

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Got this to keep on the porch and use when it's raining. Inexpensive is the best thing going for it. A good amount of assembly required and covers the basics.
customer_reviews.author: burgdob

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy. This grill heats uniformly across the entire cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. This grill heats uniformly across the entire cooking surface. Something you don't get on a lot of grills We are very.satisfied with this purchase and will recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Elson

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Grill
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely low quality grill. If I had recognized its lack of quality before I has assembled it I would have returned it. It is poorly constructed and probably not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few grills, but this is the best value for the dollar. Easy to put together, even cooking & no wasted space. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price you cant miss. I had this ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cant miss. I had this thing together in under an hour. It gets hot fast and cools down really quick to the cover back on. I've used it about 10 times to date, no issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Cassette

customer_reviews.title: The only negatives are 1) lighting the sides burners from ...
customer_reviews.text: The only negatives are 1) lighting the sides burners from the central burner and 2) having to lift the grill by the (rather weak) side table to roll it around.
customer_reviews.author: 3DayPriest

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy side trays.
customer_reviews.text: Both sides, are not sturdy, they bend when you put a heavy pan, such as cast iron skillet. The side with the burner is especially flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a little challenging putting together, but over all nice. It starts up right away. The one thing it should have is a handle on one side, so when you have to wheel it you have something to grab on to.
customer_reviews.author: Eve  Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price, not great
customer_reviews.text: Good little grill, the starter worked once and then, not so much. It's pretty easy to start with a light torch though so i didn't worry about it too much for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shoelvr

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Really good for our family of 6. Was difficult to assemble. Instructions were not always easy to read and some parts here hard to get into place
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a sturdier model, or struggle with savings.
customer_reviews.text: Required me to hire an assembler, but worked fine at first. A month later it won’t light.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what we got it for, grilling meat. Took some time to put together but wasn't difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: A surprise purchase
customer_reviews.text: A surprise purchase for my husband using the points from the Prime card! He loves it. I don’t have to cook. Win/Win!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Assembled it in less then 30 min by ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Assembled it in less then 30 min by my self. Even heating and nicely sealed around.no wiggle. Very good basic grill for the price
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: It took about an hour and a half to put together, not I like the grill and it get hot..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap little cooker works great
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap, but once it's together it pretty awesome, I just got it to use onteh boat now it's at our shop used a couple times a week
customer_reviews.author: Chan Man

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Great grill I use all the time ....lights easy heats even cooks well 👍
customer_reviews.author: ethompson49

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality BBQ with good functionality with the 3 burners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found it fairly easy to assemble - decent instructions
customer_reviews.text: Found it fairly easy to assemble - decent instructions. Works well, easy to clean. Not sure if it will las as long as the faithful Webber it replaced, but for the price that will not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: NorfolkBoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill for the money...
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill for the price....the main body of the grill is stamped steel, not die cast aluminum as my previous Char-Boil Grill. Like most inexpensive grills, probable will use it for 4-5 years then replace. Made in China, acceptable quality but the screws are typical for Chinese product...dead soft as butter..They strip out easily. Be careful if using a power screwdriver to assemble. Someone wrote it took them 4 hours to assemble? It took me about an hour, that included taking coffee breaks, phone calls etc....I could see it being difficult for someone that's not mechanically inclined. The packaging was incredible...suitable for inter galactic shipment. Haven't fired it up yet...gonna try tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: steven p.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great grill and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great grill and well worth the price. It doesn't get as hot as fast as my old grill but that's not nearly a problem. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good Size, Not longterm.
customer_reviews.text: This grill was the perfect size for my small porch area at my apartment/condo. The flame became inconsistent over time. Something broke and the flames were going crazy and the grill was unusable almost exactly a year later. Time to go shopping for another grill! Not repurchasing, need a larger one due to moving to a house.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane Kirtley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill
customer_reviews.text: Lots of parts. J had to follow the pictorial assembly instructions. Took me a hour to assemble but it's a nice sturdy grill which looks like it might last more than my usual 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Hanssen

customer_reviews.title: No drip pan
customer_reviews.text: There is no drip pain underneath the grill so everything you grill drips onto the ground. There is a small metal piece that covers les than half then a tiny metal cup that hangs underneath. Was expecting something to catch all the drippings.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Arcangeli

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great
customer_reviews.text: Was a early Christmas present for my husband n he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Overall a bad buy and bad
customer_reviews.text: Amazon does not tell us that assembling the unit will cost a lot of $$. It is cheaper to buy a full assembled piece from LOWES or Home depot. While assembling I came across many screws which were not proper and it was quite an effort in getting it together:(. Overall a bad buy and bad experience
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design all grease drains on concrete so stained mess blows out flames when it’s Wendy wish I would t have purchased not happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Staci Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great value of grill
customer_reviews.text: Sure, I've used better grills before, but this one works well and came at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I dislike is that when you are cooking and you open ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike is that when you are cooking and you open the top, if you have juicy meat on the top rack towards the back, the grease drips out onto the patio. I am trying to put foil along that opening to stop that. Otherwise, a great grill.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Varner

customer_reviews.title: Good basic grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. This is the simplest grill you can get but works fine for regular family meals and doesn’t take up a lot of space on our porch.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi D. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well but was a pain in the BUTT to assemble !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Molinari

customer_reviews.title: Nice BBQ but problems with shipping
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up. It only took myself about an hour. The instructions were very easy. The only problem was in shopping the box was damaged. And the shelf was dented pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: garrett

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Glad I didn’t spend a fortune on bells and whistles as this into is better than more expensive bbq I’ve had in past. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is an easy assembly, easy start, and even cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Cindylindyhas

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for second home up north. Perfect for grilling for a group of people. About 2 hours to put together
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: easy assemble great bbq
customer_reviews.text: 3 burner great for everything you cook. Cooks evenly great investment and not$$
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kyburz

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: No issues..take your time building..good value.I should have bought a cover for it
customer_reviews.author: Dave Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill
customer_reviews.text: It is a fine product for the money. Cook on lower settings or you will burn your food! Not for the expert chef but, perfect for first time home owner. Looks nice and doesn’t take up slot of space.
customer_reviews.author: tamara kenney

customer_reviews.title: ... puzzle to put together but the instructions are really good.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat of a jig saw puzzle to put together but the instructions are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CharBroil 3 Burner
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the quality was adequate. It’s not as sturdy as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good quality,  tank not included
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill, works great, but lots of assembly, 2-3 hours, instructions were easy to follow. Gas tank not included, $35 at Home Depot. Plastic wheels are a little unsteady, I’ll probably replace, but if you don’t move it a lot, not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Richard George

customer_reviews.title: WORKED ONCE
customer_reviews.text: After hours of putting this together it took right off and we had a barbeque dinner. We have never been able to get it to start again. We have tried to manually start it, changed propane tanks and a number of other things all with no result.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Heppes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. was easy to assemble. fired up first time I pressed the igniter button.
customer_reviews.author: G. D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great BBQ for the money. Had to switch and drill the lid stop hole with warming tray pivot hole. Factory installed it wrong but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good!! I love this grill! Took awhile to assemble but the directions made it very easy and was fun to do. Very fond of this grill!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: it feels sturdy and looks terrific
customer_reviews.text: The grill arrived on time. I am a 68 year old women and I put the grill together all by myself. It took me 3 and 1/2 hours. The directions were very clear. I didn't have a propane tank so I have not tried cooking with it yet. But, it feels sturdy and looks terrific. I will be excited to cook some steaks/burgers/veggies on my new grill. And, cook some sauce on the side burner.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Chick

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad to put together, parts are well marked
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Libby

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: the igniters on this are already failing after only using several times.
customer_reviews.author: Angie S.

customer_reviews.title: It does not ignite for whatever reason.  Not right to pay for this and not have it work.
customer_reviews.text: My husband had gone outside twice to cook steaks on the grill and would not ignite. He came in very frustrated and had to cook the steak on an indoor electric grills. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Fregeole

customer_reviews.title: Alot of grill for not alot of money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this grill for my husband for Father's Day. He loves it! My favorite is the side burner. So convenient and the price is right. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime M. DePaola

customer_reviews.title: This was a birthday present for my son. He ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my son. He put it together and had me over for a cookout. The grill worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hedie Baden

customer_reviews.title: Definitely some assembly required not too many tools needed
customer_reviews.text: Great little barbecue grill so far so good I had absolutely no issues with this girl good product good price
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Putting it together was kind of rough
customer_reviews.text: I think the product is good. been using it for about two weeks now. Only thing that was negative for me was putting it together. Instructions were not as good as I thought they could have been.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Zeris

customer_reviews.title: Best grill ever
customer_reviews.text: The heat that come out of this grill is the best ever
customer_reviews.author: Florence M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Light and cheap to buy.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit flimsy to move around but seems to be holding together.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Grunklee

customer_reviews.title: Ignitor did not work. Also the heat is inconsistent ...
customer_reviews.text: Ignitor did not work. Also the heat is inconsistent even on the same element. Contacted the manufacturing and should receive replacement ignitor components.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tucker

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. It was a bit difficult to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: We have only used it once...so far so good. It was a bit difficult to put together (even with two of us), because the direction s aren't very clear and the spacing is tight in some spots.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen B.

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love our grill
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our grill. Use it all the time. Great price! Assembly wasn’t as awful as some reviews say.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burners don’t provide enough heat.
customer_reviews.text: Heat not enough even at high causing long cooking times. First and third burners keep turning off and needs to be relit. These two burners have to be lit manually.
customer_reviews.author: manny zacarias

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Wow. My grill came all scratched and with absolutely no hardware. I am so totally disappointed and so is my husband that i bought it for. Some early fathers day present. 👎👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Deann Goeman

customer_reviews.title: Great bbq for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. Very good to use for when there are burn bans. Also easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Jared Lessley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its pretty good, ordering a side burner too is kinda a waste though we barely use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was kind of a bitch, can't get the LP tank to sit properly in the unit, but overall a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: pamela j.miller

customer_reviews.title: Decent starter grill
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a bad starter grill for someone who wants to test out how often they'll actually use a gas grill before making a big investment. The locking device and holder for the tank could use some improvements, and it is lacking a thermometer which is more of a nice to have. If you're handy with a step drill bit you can add one on the cheaper end. It does heat up quick and retains heat fairly well, but be prepared to use a match or long stem lighter to get it going. The starter button isn't worth the red plastic it is made of.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent grill for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This product went together faster than I thought and cooks exactly how I'd hoped!
customer_reviews.author: Rev Alex Carlson

product_meta.title: Char-Broil Classic 360 3-Burner Liquid Propane Gas Grill with Side Burner
product_meta.description: Style:With Side BurnerThe Char-Broil classic 3B 360 is a three burner gas grill, which offers 30,000-btu's of heat. The primary cooking surface offers 360 square" of cooking space, & measures" wide x" deep. The grates are porcelain-coated, making them rust-resistant & easy to both cook on & clean. Features an 8,000-btu side burner, perfect for sides & sauces while you grill. Opposite the side burner is a metal side shelf, which is durable & provides much needed work & prep space, & measures" wide x" deep. The grills sits on two fixed' & two 6-inch wheels, for both portability & stability. Features piezo ignition for fast & reliable startups, & in-line stainless steel burners which are built to last. The steel lid & firebox are both porcelain-coated, making the Char-Broil classic 360 capable of withstanding the weather & elements. Assembled dimensions: 51.2-Inches w x 24inches L x 43inches H. Cooking System - Convectional
feature_bullets: 360 square inches of cooking space over porcelain-coated grates
170 square inch porcelain-coated swing-a-way rack for warming
8,000 btu side burner provides a secondary cooking space for sides or sauces
Three stainless steel in-line burners for cooking performance
Porcelain-coated steel lid and firebox stand up to weather and the elements
